decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: A101 + A201 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Block Plan, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Ground Plan, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 First Floor

A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Front Elevation, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Loft plan, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Rear Elevation, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Roof plan, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Section 1
A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Section 2, A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Side Elevation 1 and A102 + A202 Emscote Mount W5 2RP P3 Side Elevation 2
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The approved rooflights to the roof slope shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013 and policy DAA of Ealing's Local plan (Reg.18).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Polices D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Two storey side extension, extension to existing roof (with rooflight to side roofslope), single storey side/rear extension (following demolition of existing rear extension); part single part two storey side/rear extension; rear roof extension; removal of single south chimney; replacement of single glazed, steel framed casement windows for double glazed, steel framed casement windows and installation of rooflight to flank main roof slope alterations to side fenestration
